effect_entries.effect: Teaches Pluck to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Pluck to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
自分が　おぼえている　技の　うち
どれか　１つを　くりだす。
自分が　寝ているときだけ　使える。

While it is asleep, the user randomly uses
one of the moves it knows.

Chi la usa sfodera a caso una delle proprie mosse
mentre sta dormendo.

Caja en la que se pueden guardar los Sellos que
se aplican a las Cápsulas de las Poké Balls.

Anwender setzt per Zufall eine ihm bekannte
Attacke im Schlaf ein.

Le lanceur utilise un de ses coups au hasard
pendant qu’il dort.

자신이 배운 기술 중
하나를 무작위로 날린다.
자신이 잠들어 있을 때만 쓸 수 있다.

じぶんが　おぼえている　わざの　うち
どれか　１つを　くりだす。
じぶんが　ねている　ときだけ　つかえる。

The user pecks the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
plucks it and gains its effect.

The user pecks the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
plucks it and gains its effect.

Le lanceur picore l’ennemi. S’il tient
une Baie, le lanceur s’en empare et
profite de ses effets.

The user pecks the foe. If the foe is
holding a Berry, the user plucks it and
gains its effect.

The user pecks the foe. If the foe is
holding a Berry, the user plucks it and
gains its effect.

The user pecks the foe. If the foe is
holding a Berry, the user plucks it and
gains its effect.
